name: Magic Mixologist
description:
Made for Bevy Jam 2.

You are a wizard take loves combining and mixing his spells.

Pick 2 spells to combine and then play a match 3 game inspired by Puzzle & Dragon to determine it's power.

Left click 2 cards to combine them into a new spell.

 Hold and drag an orb by holding left mouse button.

You have 9 seconds to swap orbs without letting go. Try to make as many matches as possible.

The spell only uses the orbs of the same color as it's elements.

Pink orbs give you some health back.

Code available here: https://github.com/asafigan/bevy_jam_2
